extensionDescription.message: Hides local products found on any page on TEMU

statusActive.description: Status text when filter is on

statusInactive.description: Status text when filter is off

hiddenCount.description: Label for the total hidden items counter

toastSupport.description: Toast message prompting user to enable affiliate

affiliateInfoContent.message: By enabling this feature, you support the developer at no extra cost to you. The extension appends a referral code to product links.

toastHiddenCount.description: Label for hidden items on current page

thankYouTitle.description: Title for the thank you toast

thankYouMessage.message: Your support helps me keep this extension free and updated.
thankYouMessage.description: Message for the thank you toast

onboardingSubtitle.message: Thank you for installing the extension. You are now ready to browse Temu without seeing local warehouse products.

onboardingFeature2.message: Shows you a counter of hidden items on each page.

onboardingFeature3.message: Everything runs in the background smoothly.

onboardingSupportText.message: This extension is free and open source. You can support the developer by enabling the optional affiliate feature. This adds a referral code to Temu links at no extra cost to you.
